verses.verse: I will give you thanks <S%H3034><s%> with my whole heart. <S%H3820><s%> Before the gods, <S%H430><s%> I will sing praises to you. <S%H2167><s%>

I will bow <S%H7812><s%> down toward your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple, <S%H1964><s%> and give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to your Name <S%H8034><s%> for your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and for your truth; <S%H571><s%> for you have exalted <S%H1431><s%> your Name <S%H8034><s%> and your Word above all. <S%H565><s%>
In the day <S%H3117><s%> that I called, <S%H7121><s%> you answered <S%H6030><s%> me. <S%H7292><s%> You encouraged me with strength <S%H5797><s%> in my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
All the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will give you thanks, <S%H3034><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for they have heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Yes, <S%H7891><s%> they will sing of the ways <S%H1870><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for great <S%H1419><s%> is Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s glory. <S%H3519><s%>
For though Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is high, <S%H7311><s%> yet he looks <S%H7200><s%> after the lowly; <S%H8217><s%> but the proud, <S%H1364><s%> he knows <S%H3045><s%> from afar. <S%H4801><s%>

Though I walk <S%H3212><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of trouble, <S%H6869><s%> you will revive <S%H2421><s%> me. <S%H7971><s%> You will stretch forth your hand <S%H3027><s%> against the wrath <S%H639><s%> of my enemies. <S%H341><s%> Your right hand <S%H3225><s%> will save me. <S%H3467><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will fulfill <S%H1584><s%> that which concerns me; <S%H2617><s%> your loving kindness, Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%> Don't <S%H7503><s%> forsake the works <S%H4639><s%> of your own hands. <S%H3027><s%>
